alert.note: Alert for Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:48PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison County through 315 PM MDT... At 247 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sheridan, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Twin Bridges, Pony and Laurin. This includes Highway 287 between mile markers 58 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Montana.
